title: Requirements Gathering
description: Gather and document functional, non-functional and user requirements from stakeholders.

title: Define Architecture and Design
description: Design the overall platform architecture, user interfaces, data models, APIs and security measures.

title: Backend Development
description: Develop the server-side functionality such as API endpoints, data processing, and game logic.

title: Frontend Development
description: Create the user interfaces, including the game design and user experience.

title: Database Design
description: Design the database schema for storing user data, game progress, and learning analytics.

title: Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Develop test cases for functional, non-functional, and security testing of the platform.

title: DevOps and Deployment
description: Deploy the platform on a suitable cloud infrastructure, monitor its performance, and manage updates.

title: Security Audit
description: Conduct a security audit to ensure the platform is secure against common vulnerabilities.
